title: Can a permanently banned account be used again on the client
body:
my account was removed for using 3rd party programs

I'm starting to lose hope here but, in February of 2017 I was permanently banned for using a custom skins program. the program would leave text in the chat logs, which is indeed sketchy, the program was named *something* buddy. it allowed me to use any fan made skins or actual skins in game, for my eyes to see.

in my personal opinion I wish I could have a discussion with someone from riot games for some closure of the situation, I have been trying to get support tickets and made many posts for months now. I just want this account back, I need to type to my friends again.

the accounts name was l PRIDE l , like it matters I type this

replies.body: Even though the account was banned for third party programs, you're always more than welcome to reach out to us to open up that discussion again. We'd be more than happy to explain why the ban was placed, and the potential risks to other users if we allowed third party programs.

when and where can I have this conversation. because I just learned that I was using a scripting program for custom skins, I'm not smart for not doing research. but, i'd enjoy talking to an employee about my situation.
The program you're talking about is elo buddy. And that's why you were banned.
omg, I just did the research. I'm an idiot. yeah I'm not getting it back. that looks right. thanks
